A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Without spoiling anything... Great movie\, many plot twists and so much more. Mark Hamill did a fantastic job as did the new cast. I am happy to disagree with others\, have loved Star Wars since seeing the original in its original run and liked The Last Jedi. It has taken me a couple days to fully process the end\, really shocked me and left me quite sad. My expectations were fairly high and they were exceeded. Luke said it “This will not go the way you expect it to...” and was right on so many levels.
